title: Dennis Berti
subtitle: Dennis Berti
awwwards: Site of the day, Mobile excellence, Devaward
header: This is a portfolio website of a music dependent life form, washed up sportsman, especially gifted food guzzler, very good friend, and passionate visual storyteller.

content.header: This website got Site of the Day on Awwwards and FWA!
paragraphs: I was tasked to showcase Dennis’ unique approach to wedding photography and his stunning works: “The elegance of honesty needs no adornment”. The blogging feature of the website allows Dennis to share his knowledge and tips collected throughout his long-long career.

content.header: Some other recognitions that we got include Honorable Mention, Mobile Excellence and Development awards.
paragraphs: The goal of the project was to create a photographer website that will be different to all the folios out there. With all the hard work we’ve managed to achieve this ambitious goal.
